column2: an A.M. Eatery////Experience - Eating here has inspired me to try making hollandaise sauce and Eggs Benedict at home to recreate the flavors. We came early
column3: maybe 40 minutes after they have opened
column4: but the place was already packed. From the very extensive menu
column5: I narrowed down to my main goal which were the Eggs Benedict
column7: all seemed so promising that I had to go with the Benny Duo - the half and half option that let the indecisive eater chooses two Benny toppings. Mine was a combo of Smashed Avocado and Bella Bella (prosciutto and balsamic dressing). I ordered an AM Manhattan to really kick off the morning as well. Quick service even for a packed place.
